chart_description: This chart shows the full pressure stall time for I/O operations on the disk. Full pressure stall time is the amount of time a process waits to perform operations in case the device is too busy with other processes. This chart helps in understanding the I/O performance of the system and can be used to optimize the disk usage.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: The amount of time a process waits when the disk is 10% full.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: The amount of time a process waits when the disk is 300% full.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: The amount of time a process waits when the disk is 60% full.
